briefdescription.para: Enumerates the set of configuration settings of a DeckLink device which may be queried or set (see IDeckLinkConfiguration Interface for details)

briefdescription.para: Compute the length of bytes of a single image row.

detaileddescription.para: This calculation is trivial for simple pixel formats but for formats where the size of a pixel in bytes is non-integer we have to consider alignment. The values here are taken from the DeckLink BlackMagic SDK docs shipped in this repo in /doc/.

parameterdescription.para: The pixel format of the frame
The width of the frame in pixels

simplesect.para: The number of bytes per frame row

memberdef.argsstring: (IDeckLink *device, REFIID interface_id, std::unique_ptr< InterfaceType, IDeckLinkHandleDeleter > &dest, const std::string &interface_name)
memberdef.name: load_interface
